verses.verse: <WG4012> But Concerning <WG1161> <WG3588> Things Sacrificed To Idols. <WG1494> We Know, <WG1492> For <WG3754> All <WG3956> Knowledge <WG1108> We Have : <WG2192> <WG3588> Knowledge <WG1108> Puffs Up, <WG5448> <WG3588> But <WG1161> Love <WG26> Builds Up. <WG3618>

<WG1487> But If <WG1161> Anyone <WG5100> Thinks <WG1380> To Have Known <WG1492> Anything, <WG5100> <WG3764> Nothing Yet <WG3762> He Has Known <WG1097> According As <WG2531> It Is Necessary <WG1163> To Know. <WG1097>
<WG1487> But If <WG1161> Anyone <WG5100> Love <WG25> <WG3588> God, <WG2316> He <WG3778> Is Known <WG1097> ' By <WG5259> Him : <WG846>

Concerning <WG4012> The <WG3588> Eating <WG1035> Then <WG3767> <WG3588> Of Things Sacrificed To Idols, <WG1494> We Know <WG1492> That <WG3754> Nothing <WG3762> An Idol Is <WG1497> In The <WG1722> World, <WG2889> And <WG2532> That There Is <WG3754> No <WG3762> God <WG2316> Other <WG2087> <WG1487> Except <WG3361> One. <WG1520>

<WG2532> For Even <WG1063> If Indeed <WG1512> There Are Those <WG1526> Called <WG3004> Gods, <WG2316> Whether <WG1535> In <WG1722> Heaven <WG3772> Or <WG1535> On <WG1909> The <WG3588> Earth, <WG1093> As <WG5618> There Are <WG1526> Gods <WG2316> Many <WG4183> And <WG2532> Lords <WG2962> Many, <WG4183>

' But <WG235> To Us There Is <WG2254> One <WG1520> God <WG2316> The <WG3588> Father, <WG3962> Of <WG1537> Whom Are <WG3739> <WG3588> All Things, <WG3956> And <WG2532> We <WG2249> For <WG1519> Him; <WG846> And <WG2532> One <WG1520> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> ' By <WG1223> Whom Are <WG3739> <WG3588> All Things, <WG3956> And <WG2532> We <WG2249> ' By <WG1223> Him. <WG846>

' But <WG235> Not <WG3756> In <WG1722> All <WG3956> Is The <WG3588> Knowledge : <WG1108> Some <WG5100> But <WG1161> <WG3588> With Conscience <WG4893> Of The <WG3588> Idol, <WG1497> Until <WG2193> Now <WG737> As Of <WG5613> A Thing Sacrificed To An Idol <WG1494> Eat, <WG2068> And <WG2532> <WG3588> <WG4893> Their Conscience, <WG846> Weak <WG772> Being, <WG5607> Is Defiled. <WG3435>

<WG1033> But Meat <WG1161> Us <WG2248> <WG3756> Does Not Commend <WG3936> <WG3588> To God; <WG2316> Neither <WG3777> For <WG1063> If <WG1437> We Eat <WG5315> Have We An Advantage; <WG4052> Neither <WG3777> If <WG1437> <WG3361> We Eat Not <WG5315> Do We Come Short. <WG5302>
<WG991> But Take Heed <WG1161> Lest <WG3381> <WG3588> Power <WG1849> Your <WG5216> This <WG3778> An Occasion Of Stumbling <WG4348> Become <WG1096> To Those <WG3588> Being Weak. <WG770>

<WG1437> For If <WG1063> Anyone <WG5100> See <WG1492> Thee, <WG4571> Who <WG3588> Hast <WG2192> Knowledge, <WG1108> In <WG1722> An Idol Temple <WG1493> Reclining At Table, <WG2621> Not <WG3780> The <WG3588> Conscience <WG4893> Of Him <WG846> Weak <WG772> Being <WG5607> Will Be Built Up <WG3618> So As <WG1519> <WG3588> <WG3588> Things Sacrificed To Idols <WG1494> To Eat? <WG2068>
And <WG2532> Will Perish <WG622> The <WG3588> Weak <WG770> Brother <WG80> On <WG1909> <WG3588> <WG4674> Thy Knowledge, <WG1108> ' For <WG1223> Whom <WG3739> Christ <WG5547> Died. <WG599>

<WG3779> Now Thus <WG1161> Sinning <WG264> Against <WG1519> The <WG3588> Brethren, <WG80> And <WG2532> Wounding <WG5180> Their <WG846> <WG3588> Conscience <WG4893> Weak, <WG770> Against <WG1519> Christ <WG5547> Ye Sin. <WG264>

Wherefore <WG1355> If <WG1487> Meat <WG1033> Cause To Offend <WG4624> <WG3588> Brother <WG80> My, <WG3450> <WG3756> Not At All <WG3361> Should I Eat <WG5315> Flesh <WG2907> <WG1519> <WG3588> Forever, <WG165> That <WG2443> Not <WG3361> <WG3588> Brother <WG80> My <WG3450> I May Cause To Offend. <WG4624>
